name: Jinzo - Lord
effectText: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 1 face-up "Jinzo" you control to the GY. Trap Cards, and their effects on the field, cannot be activated. Negate all Trap effects on the field. Once per turn: You can destroy as many face-up Traps on the field as possible, and if you do, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed.
